communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: Untitled (University of California, Berkeley)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

all documents tracking NIL deals from July 2021 onward, including itemized lists of transactions, the amounts paid to athletes in each sport, the funding source for each payment and the services required in the contracts.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

C. McCullough

communications.subject: RE: California Public Records Act Request: Untitled (University of California, Berkeley)
communications.communication:
Hello,

The UC Office of the President (UCOP) has received your Public Records Act request, below. UCOP does not have these campus records; you would need to submit a request directly to the campus using the contact information here:
https://www.ucop.edu/uc-legal/legal-resources/information-practices/information-practices-coordinators.html

We consider this request closed.

Sincerely,
UCOP Public Records
UC, Office of the President
1111 Franklin St.
Oakland, CA 94607
pra@ucop.edu<mailto:pra@ucop.edu>
